name: The Platypus
description:
Submission for the Beginner's Circle Game Jam #1 

Your typical shoot -em up platformer with a twist! Avoid and finish the blobs. Art style is inspired by Keith Haring, a famous painter during the 80's to fit the theme "1980s". 

Developer - Gerbil
Artist - SinigangShake
Composer-Dmytro Nebesh

Controls:
E - pick up guns 
AD/Arrow Keys - Move 
SPACE - jump

Also, if you guys are curious where the platypus is:

The Platypus is the placeholder used before the blobs were made. Celebrate programmer art!
